content: *this dear little amigurumi bunny is so quick and easy to crochet that you may have to make a whole hutch-full perfectly sized for children to tuck into their backpacks and only one of our many amigurumi animals as seen in martha stewart living january 2010 lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60480a published in lion brand yarn catalog - 2006 w skill level easy wool-ease® article #620 2 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers polyester fiberfill stuffing 2 small beads or felt circles for eyes * note if bunny is to be a toy do not use beads instead use small circles cut from felt * brown embroidery floss and embroidery needle some construction required to finish *register at the lion brand website to access free patterns *
